arts.ttl: Nuno shrugs off title-race pressure after nervy win over Saints
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest head coach Nuno Espirito Santo does not believe the pressure of competing for honours is affecting his side, despite almost surrendering a three-goal advantage to bottom side Southampton.

arts.sum: Southampton manager Ivan Juric wants more consistency from his side after a poor first half in a narrow 3-2 loss to Nottingham Forest in the Premier League.
